attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: THERE SHOULD BE A CURFEW AFTER 11P.M. FOR ALL FLIGHTS.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read. If you would like this petition to be approved please send it in without using just capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
